name: registrable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
that can or needs to be put on an official list or record: Registrable persons are required to register with the authorities within 14 days of the end of their sentence. Some crimes are registrable offences, which means that the offender's name is kept on a register and their movements monitored.
More examplesFewer examplesAccording to the law, people in public life must make a statement of their registrable interests.All registrable boats are required to have an indication of capacity clearly marked.When a company lists assets in its accounts, registrable charges may need to be paid.
